text:
Limitation Amendment Act 2017

An Act to amend the Limitation Act 1974
[Royal Assent 20 December 2017]

Be it enacted by Her Excellency the Governor of Tasmania, by and with the advice and consent of the Legislative Council and House of Assembly, in Parliament assembled, as follows:

1. Short title
    This Act may be cited as the Limitation Amendment Act 2017 .

2. Commencement
    This Act commences on a day to be proclaimed.

3. Principal Act
    In this Act, the Limitation Act 1974 is referred to as the Principal Act.

4.
    The amendments effected by this section have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Limitation Act 1974 .

5.
    The amendment effected by this section has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Limitation Act 1974 .

6.
    The amendments effected by this section have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Limitation Act 1974 .

7.
    The amendment effected by this section has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Limitation Act 1974 .

8.
    The amendments effected by this section have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Limitation Act 1974 .

9.
    The amendment effected by this section has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Limitation Act 1974 .

10.
    The amendment effected by this section has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Limitation Act 1974 .

11. Repeal of Act
    This Act is repealed on the three hundred and sixty fifth day from the day on which it commences.
